string.name: parent
string.value: The One Hidden in the Shadow
#b#p2081400##k says he has something to tell me...perhaps I should pay him a visit.
#b#p2081400##k told me to meet #b#p1052001##k. Now that I think about it, it's been a long time since I've seen the Dark Lord. He never seems to age...
#p1052001# said he has some interesting suggestions and that if I'm interested, he'll tell me more.
You have the 4th Job advancement. Do you still have things to do? If not, I'd like to suggest something you may find interesting.
Wise choice. I thought you would accept my suggestion. Don't worry, this will be helpful for you too.
Do you know #b#p1052001##k? I thought you would know him as he made you a Thief. Go to see him. He might need you.
If you do not try something you're not familiar with, you are not a true Thief.
Since you are here, you must be a Thief. You look familiar... You came here when you were a beginner, didn't you? Wow, look at you.You became a wonderful Thief. Are you the one #p2081400# sent?
That's right. I saw something special in your eyes. I have a suggestion for you. Come back to me if you are interested.
